Reference

Prepare

prep_techmix() prep_techmixB()

Prepare the output of r2dii.analysis::target_market_share() for plot_techmix()

prep_timeline()

Prepare the output of r2dii.analysis::target_sda() for plot_timeline()

prep_trajectory() prep_trajectoryB()

Prepare the output of r2dii.analysis::target_market_share() for plot_trajectory()

Plot

plot_techmix()

Create a techmix chart in a ggplot object

plot_timelineA() plot_timelineB() plot_timelineC()

Creates a time line plot

plot_trajectoryA() plot_trajectory() plot_trajectoryB()

Create a trajectory alignment chart in a ggplot object

theme_2dii()

A theme to apply 2DII plotting aesthetics

Helpers

timeline_specs()

Creates the default specs data frame for plot_timelineA()

r2dii.plot A - Thin API

plot_techmixX()

Create a techmix plot

plot_timelineX()

Create a timeline plot

plot_trajectoryX()

Create a trajectory plot

Datasets

market_share

Dataset imitating the output of r2dii.analysis::target_market_share()

sda

Dataset imitating the output of r2dii.analysis::target_sda()
